alert.note: Alert for Adams; Clay; Nuckolls; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 1:54AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Clay, northwestern Nuckolls, northeastern Webster and southern Adams Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 154 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bladen, or 16 miles southwest of Hastings, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Blue Hill around 205 AM CDT. Ayr around 210 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Lawrence, Fairfield and Deweese. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
